rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: A remarkable fount of knowledge.  He's the rare theorist who knows a great deal of experimental detail as well and can answer every bizarre question we dream up.

CRE's da Bomb! He's too advanced for any one text.  You can't stop him.  He is like a white hole (opposite of a black hole) that spews forth knowledge whether you want it or not.  Most people want it.  Show me another professor who can tell you the number of grams in the Sun and I'll show you an accelerated observer with a vanishing Riemann tensor!

Here are the facts about Chuck and E&M II. (1) Chuck is extremely lucid. (2) Chuck is slightly insane.  (3) Chuck truly is our Uber-Nerd-Messiah! (4) Jackson (text) is daunting, but reliable.  (5) Chuck will make up his own problems to unnecessarily supplement this tome.  (6) Chuck knows about a hundred digits of pi and likes Pink Floyd.
